experience.intro: During my education I've pursued a variety of experiences ranging from...

list: Presenting and explaining data structure concepts to groups of students in labs
Guiding individual students to solutions for programming problems using C++
Developing and maintaining C++ code bases for use in computer science labs
Coordinating lab and lecture materials development with project management software
Proctoring student exams and coding proficiency demonstrations
Training new employees with debugging exercises and code discussions
Developing an interactive web application using Node.js and React.js with TypeScript
Data modeling for a graph data structure implemented with an MVC architecture
Scrum-like collaborative procedures with a team of peers
Collaborating with continuous integration using git and GitLab with CI/CD
Researching unfamiliar technologies for use in project development
Working directly with MCECS students and faculty for IT troubleshooting
Collaborating on revisions to technical documentation and website content
Attending weekly informational presentations on IT subjects
